inn1.comm: some swing into the left-hander, a shout for lbw but comfortably going down
the line is on the pads again, straighter, and this time Tharanga gets some bat on it and sends it fine
short of a length, climbs slowly, offers width, Tharanga goes after it and misses
a leave now, good length going across a foot outside off
on the bounce to Dhoni, did not get up much as Tharanga shoulders arms outside off again
far wider outside off than the previous couple and Tharanga flags it through
gentle straightening full ball outside off, Mahela pats it away
awayswinger, good length, starting outside off and left alone
nice, good length ball angled in on off, and swerves away sharply from Mahela, who shoulders arms
decent start from Vinay, another outswinger on a length close to off, Mahela lets it go again
this one is on the stumps, does not swing, and Mahela is caught on the pad, too high though
overpitched on the stumps, Mahela drives back to Vinay
swinging down the pads and Tharanga leans over to send it racing past square leg

appeal for lbw, not given, hit him at the top of the flap and pitched just outside leg, closer than the shocker Sanga got in the previous game, though, umpire Llong makes the correct decision, shakes  his head, they take a tight leg-bye after some indecision
charges out, makes some room and gets a thick edge down to third man
right on off stump now, good length, stays a touch low, kept out
that kicked and straightened into the left-hander, who was taken  by surprise and jabbed an inside edge fine past the keeper
skids into the pads, Mahela crouches and works it to fine leg
this was full and swung in late, Tharanga pushed with a slightly closed face and got an inside edge to pad
tries to smack it off the back foot through the covers but finds no timing as there's not too much width
neat, pushes a straightening length ball softly in front of extra cover and takes the single
gentle outswinger, 130 kph, on the bounce to Dhoni as Mahela leaves
good delivery, opened him up with one that held the line on off stump, Mahela stabs it towards cover
walks out and pushes away from the body at one that jags away off the seam, and is beaten, that was some serious movement
pitches outside leg and goes straight on, Tharanga gets enough on it
nice comeback, more effort on this length ball, that rips past the outside edge as it hits the seam and moves away close to off
gets him driving at a wide and full one, Tharanga misses again
superb line, close to off, going across, good length, Tharanga takes a step out and leaves it
another peach, angle is taking it away from the left-hander, but it on off so he has to play at it, then it pitches and moves away further to beat the edge
bounces into Mahela from just short of a length, he jabs it behind of square
this holds the line on middle stump, Tharanga was shuffling across, and pushes it back to Vinay
worked to midwicket off the pad
now this moves away, he has been straightening them into the left-hander, but this time it pitched off and jagged away, Tharanga beaten by a mile
good length into the pads now, rolls behind square
overpitched at 129 kph, around off, slight away swing, Mahela gets under it and sends it high over the bowler
pushes a length ball to covers
takes a big stride out and pushes to cover
skips out and crashes it square, but point denies him with a sharp stop
cramped for room with the angle on the length ball, mistimes a forcing punch towards cover
this length ball held the line after being angled in, Tharanga was pegged back in the crease, but the thick edge fell short of second slip

this one will carry alright, and the angle has worked for Bhuvi, the last one held its line, this one comes in from short of a length and bounces, Tharanga leans out half forward, is completely cramped by the angle and Dhoni takes the inside edge
that really took off as it swung away from a fuller length, but started outside off and Mahela was able to leave
starts to straighten but is pitched full on the pad and is worked to fine leg
left alone outside off
nice, pitched good length on off and moved away just enough off the seam to beat the outside edge
angled across and bounces sharply wide outside off
now one comes in from middle and hits him high on the pad, superb control from Vinay
straightish length ball offers width, but Mahela chops it close to the pitch, didn't get up as much as he expected
Mahela charges out, Bhuvi shortens it slightly and this time the ball bounces over Mahela's swing
good length, coming in outside off, he is across to block
thick inside edge to square leg as he tries to force it through midwicket
that came in a long way, like a quick offbreak, and hit Mahela on the pad, doing way too much
moves across and turns it off the pad to square leg
holds its line on off, Sanga leans across and nudges it square to leg
good length, straightens close to off stump, Sanga lets it go past
nudged to square leg as it straightens into the left-hander
left alone with the angle outside off
dies on Dhoni as it gets off gently from a good length outside off
tight single in front of mid off, Rohit ran across, but took time to get into position to let it go, and Sanga is home despite the direct hit
gives width first ball and is thrashed past backward point, Sanga moving just outside off to get in position
better from Ishant, finds some bounce from a length and Sanga lets it go with the angle
lovely, pitched middle and off, good length, started to move away late, hit the pitch and jagged away further, beating the edge
moving away again, slightly flatter though, and Sanga lets it go on the angle
pitched a bit further up, outside off, left alone
gets forward to a pitched up ball, and drives with a slightly closed face, mid off dives and is able to stop it
starts on top from the other end, pitches it on middle and moves it sharply past the edge
full and wide, Sanga smashes it straight to cover
more width, there is a big gap at extra cover and Sanga lunges forward to drive right through it
overpitched again, and slight width too, Mahela takes a step forward and carts it high over mid off
gets forward and softly pushes for a thick inside edge to the leg side
good length, moving across, left alone outside the off stump
Ishant gets some extra lift from good length, and it pops in the air to vacant forward short leg as Mahela moves across to work it away

that's gone way over the fine leg boundary, Mahela was walking outside the crease, Ishant banged it short of a length, it came around chest height, Mahela was in a poor position but hooked with force as he pulled his head away, and the ball flew over the man at fine leg
pinged him on the glove now, Ishant digs it in shorter, it leaps at Mahela, who tries to fend it awkwardly, it is in the air, but short leg is vacant
the short balls having some effect, Mahela stays on the back foot and runs a length ball to third man
beats him on the drive with a pitched up ball close to off
good stuff this from Ishant, good length on off, and jagging away sharply, left alone

oh dear, Mahela's just guided this tamely to the lone slip, it was a nothing delivery, a wide one moving away a bit, Mahela could have done a lot with it, he went rather softly at it with an open face, did all those Ishant short balls have anything to do with this?
right forward to push to extra cover
this has taken off from just short of driving length, a surprised Thirimanne pushes half forward and takes it on the splice
close to off, he covers the line of the stumps and lets it bounce past
angled across, left alone
pitched up on off now, he moves forward and pushes to mid off
lets a length ball go outside off
tight line close to off stump, almost 137 kph, left alone
good length on off stump, Sanga pushes it to leg and walks out, but midwicket is close by
length delivery, Sanga goes for a booming drive, but the ball stays low and goes under the bat
now this time it takes off, Dhoni takes it chest high after Sanga leaves it alone
another length delivery in the channel outside off, Sanga lets it go
length delivery on the pads, Lahiru whips it with ease to fine leg
this time he gets a leading edge through cover as he tries to work it towards square leg
he tries to leave it, but the ball jags bag and hits the thigh pad on the back leg. Dhoni has a muted appeal, but this was always too high
he walks across the stumps and a couple of steps forwards to counter the movement, but he gets squared up as he defends this one
this time, he is solidly behind the delivery, defends it to mid-off
walks across the stumps again, the batsman defends it to midwicket
and bowls a gentle full toss outside off, Sanga drives it to long off
shortish delivery outside off, it comes slow off the deck and it messes with Tharanga's timing, he pushes it to point
on the pads, the batsman whips it to deep midwicket for a single
slower delivery down the leg side, Sanga flicks it straight to Ishant at short fine. A metre on either side and that was four
another slow leg cutter on the middle, the batsman defends it back to the bowler
he comes forward and eases the full delivery to long off for a single
bowls a length delivery that jags away after hitting the seam, beats the batsman's hanging bat
cracking Sanga shot through cover, but there is protection in the deep
length delivery angled across the left-hander, left alone
dropped! by Ashwin at first slip! A healthy edge that was dipping to his left, and Ashwin went down in time, but was unable to wrap his fingers around it. Bad bad miss
he walks across and nudges the short of length delivery to fine leg
stays in the crease and tries to blast it through cover, but plays down the wrong line totally, beaten. Loose shot by Sanga there
he bowls it full outside off, the batsman easily drives it to deep extra cover for a single
another low full toss, this time on the middle stump, driven to mid on
he bowls a slower delivery outside off, the batsman waits and guides it to third man for a single
he comes forward to this pitched up delivery and drives it handsomely to wide long-on
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman cuts it past point for another single to third man
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to cover
pushed through on off, the batsman defends it easily
massive massive turn! It pitches short on off and moves a mile across the batsman
straighter one this time, the batsman defends it off the front foot
he tries to go for the big sweep, but misses the straight delivery, loud appeal for lbw, a good shout indeed
shorter and veering towards pads, the batsman works it away to square leg for a single
flatter and shorter outside off, the batsman pushes it straight to point
full delivery from round the wicket, the batsman drives it down to long off
shortish delivery outside off from over the wicket now, the batsman cracks it to deep cover off the back foot
slower delivery outside off, but it's a low full toss and it's driven down to long off
he waits for the length delivery and cuts it, but straight to point
horrible delivery, this one is wide down the leg side and Dhoni never moved too far.. Five wides
he waits on the back foot and cuts it firmly to deep point for a single
slower and fuller, the batsman comes forward and defends
he bowls it flat and short from round the wicket, the batsman defends
more short and flat stuff, Sanga easily tucks it towards square leg for a single
this one is a touch fuller and a touch quicker, the batsman gets hit on the pad, but that was always going down leg
fuller delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to the sweeper on off side for a single
very short, slow, long hop that is, Sanga had all the time in the world to slap that to any part of the ground. he chose deep midwicket
better delivery this time, it's fuller and it's on off stump. Sanga comes forward in defence
bowls a beauty first up! Loopy, pitches on middle then spins away sharply
similar delivery, but this one didn't turn that much. The batsman defends awkwardly off the back foot
tossed up outside off, this one spins away and the batsman outside edges it past the slip fielder
quicker this time, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
he was not in control of this sweep shot at all, but he is lucky that the top edge just falls behind the midwicket fielder
flatter delivery on off, the batsman defends it to cover
full and flat on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
another short ball, but this one was a touch quicker and Sanga's pull shot just clears the fielder at midwicket.. Lucky again
flatter and shorter on off stump, the batsman goes deep in the crease and tucks it to square leg for a single

dropped by Raina! Straightforward chance by Raina off his own bowling! The batsman comes out of the crease to play it down straight, but pushes it in the air towards the non-striker, Raina moved to his left, but was not able to hold on to this head high chance
flatter delivery, pushed to cover off the front foot
quicker delivery on off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
this one is high and loopy, but it's too full, the batsman drives it to deep cover
he lured the batsman out of the crease with this slower flighted delivery, the batsman is not to the pitch of the ball as he tries to time it inside out, gets a thick outside edge over the infield
flatter delivery, pushed towards midwicket for a single
quicker one fired on the pads, the batsman flicks it fine on the leg side
another quicker delivery, this time on off stump, the batsman punches it to point off the back foot
more spin for the bowler, but this was wide outside off, the batsman stretches and pushes it to cover
quicker delivery on the stumps, the batsman defends
a loud appeal for lbw! very very loud! Raina keeps asking the question. It hit the batsman as it turned past the outside edge, but that was hit outside the line of off
he goes back and pushes the shorter delivery to long off
fuller delivery, the batsman drives it straight to cover
shorter and faster on the middle stump line, the batsman nudges it to deep square leg
he moves way outside leg stump to drive it inside out, but it hits the inside half of the bat and lobs over the bowler's head. Single to long off
Tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
quicker this time, Sanga punches it to cover off the back foot
tossed up and slower, the batsman defends it to the off side
quicker delivery on the middle stumps line, Sanga dabs it to midwicket for a single
almost driven all the way back to the bowler! Thirimanne was playing for the turn, but it kept coming in
he goes on the back foot and defends a quicker delivery
he comes down the crease and takes the flighted delivery on the full, drives it to long on
shortish delivery on the leg stump line, the batsman pulls it to deep square leg
quicker and on off stump, the batsman punches it back to the bowler
he waits on the back foot and punches it to long off for a single
flighted delivery on off, Lahiru's patience helps and this time he gets the right length for the slog-sweep, hits it easily over midwicket for a boundary
he dabs it towards point and thinks about a single, but that didn't go too far. Lahiru has to turn back and dive in. He is safe.. Made it well in time
he exposes his stumps as he goes down to play a ramp shot to a flighted delivery, places it fine on the leg side for a boundary
tossed up delivery on the stumps, he comes forward and defends
pushes it quicker, but down the leg side and more extras as this one runs to the boundary. Dhoni apologises to the bowler for not moving quickly enough
now some turn for the bowler, it whizzes past the outside edge
full and on the stumps, the batsman tucks it to square leg for a single
slower this time, but the length is slightly short, allows the batsman to go back and steal a single to backward square leg
tossed up delivery on off, the batsman pushes it to point
full delivery on the stumps, the batsman drives it easily to wide long off for a single
he moves way down the leg side again, Raina bowls it flat and quick on stumps, the batsman ends up slapping it back to the bowler
waits in the crease and turns it to square leg for a single
and another one goes past Dhoni! The ball bounced a touch extra and went past the outside edge, but Dhoni is unable to take a regulation take!
quicker delivery on the middle, the batsman defends it to midwicket
he makes room by moving outside leg, slaps the shortish delivery to point where Jadeja's misfield allows a signal
he takes a step down the pitch, but is not to the pitch of the ball, defends it to leg side
goes for the slog-sweep, but the ball spins away after pitching and the batman misses it completely
he pushes it to deep cover this time to pick up an easy single
tossed up and full, it drifts in to the batsman, Sanga tries to go hard, but gets an inside edge to midwicket
drop by Dhoni/slip! But the primary culprit was Dhoni here, he got a glove to it and made it difficult for the fielder at slip. He looks rusty behind the stumps today
he tries to go inside out, but chips it towards long off from the inside half of the bat
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman flicks it to deep backward square leg
he comes down the pitch and adjusts as the length is not there, flicks it fine on the leg side
fired down the leg side, Dhoni is again late to cover the line, gets some part of the body though...
slower delivery this time, the batsman pushes it to cover for a single
tossed up delivery outside off, it goes straight on with the arm, goes past the outside edge
this time Dhoni is able to take one down the leg side as the ball spins
tossed up delivery on the stumps, the batsman comes forward and defends
bowls this one with a pause, Sanga defends it to cover again
he goes on the back foot and punches it straight to cover
he bowls this one wide, but Sanga is unlucky to push it straight to cover again, no run
tossed up on off, Sanga drives it over the infield with an inside out chip shot
wide delivery and Sanga drives this one powerfully, it goes straight to the man at deep extra cover
he goes on the back foot and easily dabs it to deep midwicket
now Lahiru goes back and nudges one to square leg
flatter and turns in to the batsman, Sanga pushes it to midwicket
he gets to his fifty with a quick single to short fine leg! his 11th in a tournament final.
he goes down on his knee and slaps the quicker delivery with a powerful sweep down to deep backward square leg
fligthed delivery wide outside off, the batsman pushes it softly to cover for a single
tossed up delivery outside off, the batsman goes deep into the crease and turns it to deep midwicket for a single
the shortness in length allows Sanga to go back and work it on the leg side
tossed up delivery on off stump, Lahiru comes forward and wristily flicks it to square leg
now some turn and bounce outside off for Ashwin, it beats the outside edge
he goes on the back foot and defends the shortish delivery to point
slow and loopy delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and drives it to cover
starts the same way he did in his first spell, wide outside off, Thirimanne cuts hard in the air, and Ashwin can't stop it with a dive at third man
this time to the right of Ashwin, and he has no need to dive this time, it has raced to the boundary, a thick edge from Thirimanne as he tried to steer a short of a length ball
pushed to extra cover
back of a length, hebpushes softly in front of cover for a single
Ishant goes wide again, but gets lift on this length ball and Sanga's flail finds air
better line, short of a length on off stump, pushed back to the bowler
length ball from round the stumps on middle, turned in front of square on leg
opens the face, follows the turn and pushes to point
moves across, gets outside off, and sweeps a tossed up ball in the air over square leg
hit to deep midwicket
flight, turn and bounce on off stump, beats the edge
stays a shade low outside off now, Thirimanne tried to dab it, missed
Sanga charges out, slogs and gets a top edge that flies to the third man boundary, the fielder had been moved squarer
four more, he moves outside off very early this time, and picks a length ball from way outside to the deep square leg rope
Sanga is taking Ishant apart, skips out again, and swats another length ball in front of the sightscreen
a short ball, he weaves inside the line and tries to dab it over the keeper, it falls short of Dhoni to his left
gone this time, walks out, makes some room outside leg, and slogs at a short ball, mid off runs back to his left and takes it
he made room, but Ishant got a rare one around the blockhole, and Sanga could only dig it out
slides in to the pad, Dhoni appeals, for a stumping, it hurried down leg, hit Dhoni's pad and ricocheted onto the stumps, but Mathews was firmly in
pushed off the front foot to the off side
hits past Ishant at point for a couple
pitches middle and jags across past the edge after drawing him forward, super delivery
quick and fired in to leg, played back
Sanga's gone, big strike, Ashwin stops and bowls a tossed up full delivery, Sanga could not get under it as he tried to loft it, and mid on took a high, tumbling catch
comes down the pitch and pushes a flighted one to Ashwin
Perera gets away, slog-sweeps from wide outside off, but the top edge falls safely over midwicket
pushed down the track
Perera has been duped all too easily, he's walked down to a juicily tossed up ball, missed it with all the turn and bounce, and Dhoni's moved across to do the rest, that bounced too much
on the pads, turned square
pushed off the front foot to point
very quick on off, defended
slight turn on off, he runs it to short third
drives a full delivery to the sweeper past extra cover's dive
fast and shortish, he mishits the pull to midwicket, Dhoni tells Jadeja to bowl fuller
pitched up, and fast again, on off stump, defended
comes out to a tossed up ball and edges it to short third man
bounces and hits the pad down leg
goes back and punches it from off to extra cover
goes back again and nudges behind square leg
stops and bowls full, is pushed to long off
that didn;t get up at all outside off, and Mathews had no chance of connecting off the back foot
full, driven to extra cover
Sri Lanka are crumbling, Chandimal's swept in the air, he's made good connection, but picked out deep backward square leg to perfection
spins in from over the stumps, stabbed back
tries to paddle a full ball from the stumps, short fine leg is around
nudged with the turn to square leg
a short ball to Herath, he pulls his head away and helps it square on leg
full on middle, he;s turned it square for one
opens the face and jabs a good length ball past point
charges out, makes room and swats hard, but Raina at extra cover has saved an almost certain boundary with a dive to his right
too wide, Mathews has guided it past point, but Dhawan has run around quickly from third man
widish length ball punched away to the sweeper
works a full ball through midwicket
moves across and works to square leg with the spin
pushed off the front foot but cover prevents the single
this time cover cannot prevent the single, and Dhoni admonishes DK, tells him he was put there to save that run
sweeps off middle to square leg, Jadeja appeals in vain
a leading edge falls safely in front of extra cover as Herath tries to whip from outside off
Ishant gets away with a full delivery down the pads, Mathews gets something on it, but not much bite on it to beat Dhoni
now Mathews goes, a short ball outside leg stump, Mathews made lots of room, and gave it a heave, ended up slicing it to third man, nothing shot
goes back, opens the face and gets a single to third man
sharp and bouncing past Herath's swing, but too wide
guided to deep point
goes back and is beaten outside off this time with a lifting length ball
bowls it full down the leg side, he's hit on the pads

Dhoni's missed the stumping on the first attempt, but that has ended up helping him get the wicket, Herath missed a sweep, Dhoni collected but could not break the stumps on the first attempt, Herath was in at that time, but he lost balance and went out, Dhoni was alert enough to spot that and did not miss the second time, an unusually vigorous appeal from him suggests he rather enjoyed that
defended off the front foot
skips out, tries to go big but skies it, Bhuvneshar charges in from long off, extra cover runs across too, but Bhuvneshwar has judged it superbly and avoided the fielder as well
nudged square on the leg side
pushed to midwicket
leaves the batsman slightly outside off and beats the edge from a good length
full and down the leg side, rolls away square
moves way outside leg and has a go, Ishant follows him, Lakmal missed
this time he connects, backs away and swats through midwicket, hasn't timed it
bounces and moves away slightly to beat the bat even as he goes outside leg again
very tough chance goes down, another move to leg and another swipe, goes in the region of third man, Rohit runs across and dives, but it eludes him
fast one on off, pushed back
pushes a quick and full one, extra cover stops it and prevents the single
pushed to extra cover
that is it, he walks out and misses outside off, Dhoni gathers, Lakmal is so far down he does not even look back, Dhoni waits and removes the bail finally

inn2.comm: starts off with a full delivery that swings away from the batsman, Rohit leaves it alone
he keeps it tight around off stump line, the batsman comes forward and defends it to point
in the channel outside off, Rohit comes forward, then lets it go
good ball! He bowls this one from wide of the crease, on a length around middle stump, and gets it to straighten from there, the batsman is squared up in his defence
another delivery that straightens after pitching, this one takes the outside edge to third man
full delivery, the batsman pushes it between mid-off and extra cover for a single
starts off with a wide delivery, very very wide..
he is showing more signs of rustiness, bowls another one wide outside off
gets his direction back, bowls a length delivery on off stump. Dhawan comes forward and defends
a good delivery this time. It was on back of length and cut back into Dhawan, who didn't expect it to. He defended it towards point
good speed now, this one is angled across the left-hander, Dhawan leaves it alone
another one that goes across the batsman, Dhawan leaves it alone
length delivery across the batsman, goes straight on, the batsman lets it go through
he bowls it full and gets some swing, but this one is on the pads, easily flicked down to fine leg
similar delivery to what Dhawan faced in the last ball of the previous over, same result, a single at fine leg
length delivery on off stump this time, Rohit comes forward and pushes it in the gap at cover
another delivery on the pads and Dhawan sends it to the boundary this time, he times it well and places it in the gap at deep backward square leg
quick and wide outside off, the batsman leaves it alone
a loose shot by Dhawan here. It was a full delivery outside off, but Dhawan went for the drive without getting close to the line of the ball, gets beaten
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends to the leg side
he is more at home against the right hander, bowls a gentle outswinger outside off, Rohit leaves it alone
he waits for this back of length delivery and opens the face to run it down to third man
he misses out this time on a boundary! It was short and wide and cracked it straight to the point fielder
length delivery on the stumps, the batsman goes on the back foot and defends it down the pitch
attempts a slower delivery, which goes to the keeper -after the batsman has left it -on the bounce
length delivery outside off, straightens a touch, but Dhawan watches it go through
angled delivery from wide of crease, Rohit tucks it past midwicket for a single
here comes the whiplash drive from Dhawan, Kusal Perera does well at cover to dive and get a hand to it to prevent the boundary
short and wide outside off, the batsman goes for an upper cut, but doesn't get the placement exactly where he wanted it, it goes fine to third man
loud appeal for lbw as this one nips back from a length and hits the batsman over the knee-roll. Going down the leg side and over the stumps
beautiful delivery! He bowls this one from wide of the crease and gets it to straighten off a length, it goes past the outside edge this time
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to mid off
bowls a length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to off
he comes forward to defend the length delivery, but gets an inside edge on to his pads as the ball straightens a touch
back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it off the back foot
another length delivery on off stump, the batsman defends it to point
he keeps it tight around that offstump line, the batsman defends it back down the pitch
finishes off a good over with another tight delivery on off stump, Dhawan defends
he beats Rohit again outside off with that away seam movement. Rohit plays for the angle but is beaten as the ball jags away
he bowls it full this time and on the middle stump, the batsman comes forward and defends it to cover
he comes forward and pushes the full delivery on the middle stump line towards midwicket
punchy, whippy cover drive, no follow through of the bat, that races through the cover area
back of length delivery on the pads, the batsman misses out as he gets it on the pads
an inside edge to backward square leg gives Dhawan a single as the bowler has his hands on his head
Angelo bowls another length delivery on the middle stump line, the batsman defends it to off
keeps bowling that nagging length, this time just outside off, Dhawan lets it go
slightly back of length this time, the batsman defends it off the back foot to the off
bowls slightly short and wide, which allows Dhawan to guide it past gully down to third man
he bowls it short of length outside off, Rohit defends it to point off the back foot
moves slightly towards the leg side to make room, but Angelo follows him, the batsman ends up pushing it back to the bowler
he comes forward and times a push to point
back of length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman defends it off the back foot this time
he takes a forward stride and drives the length delivery to mid-off

he is gone, he gets a brute of a delivery! It was on short of length and reared up surprising Dhawan with the bounce. He tried to get away from the line, but it was too late as he was already shaping to play it on the front foot. He walks back disappointed, but Sri Lanka are happy, it's a big breakthrough and early in the innings
gets a fuller length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
short of length delivery outside off, comes a touch slower after pitching, the batsman pushes it to cover
meanwhile, Angelo keeps bowling a tight line around off, the batsman pushes it to point
slightly fuller this time and Rohit drives it firmly, but straight to mid off
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it softly towards mid-on where Herath is a touch slow. The batsmen steal a single
he attempts a short delivery, but that's an easy one for Virat, he pulls it down to fine leg easily
he waits in the crease and defends the back of length delivery to off
he comes forward and defends the length delivery to off
he gets a fuller delivery on the stumps, easily flicked to fine leg for a single
he goes for a drive and is beaten by the away movement, but that one stayed low and Sanga took it on the bounce..
bowls a length delivery on off, the batsman slides it down to third man

loud appeal for caught behind, which after some time, the umpire gives. There was a loud noise when the ball went past the bat and the only doubt was if that had carried to the keeper. Once the square leg umpire nodded, it was curtains for Kohli. Beautiful delivery again, on a length outside off and just straightening enough to take the outside edge. There wasn't not much of a forward stride by the batsman there
he comes forward and defends it to point
oh beautiful this one! What was DK thinking? He went for a half-hearted prod, expecting the ball to go away, but this one cut back in and just went over the stumps
another appeal, this time for a run out at the non-striker's end as Rohit's drive hits the stumps and Mathews appeals for a run out. Angelo, however, hadn't touched it at all..
surprises the batsman with a short delivery and Rohit does well to get out of the line very late
now he jumps out of the pitch, but gets a short ball. He whacks it to deep square leg without much timing
he bowls a back of length delivery on off, the batsman defends it down the pitch
he comes forward and pushes the length ball to point
he goes wide of the crease this time and gets one to beat the outside edge as Rohit attempts a cut from too close to the body
he bowls another good delivery. It's full and it comes back a touch into the batsman. DK gets an inside edge on to the pads
length delivery on off, the batsman comes forward and defends
and another play and a miss! this was a full delivery and he plays inside the line. The ball swerved away late too..
he is bowling a testing spell here. This one is full and swinging away, stays low too. The batsman left it alone
short of length delivery outside off now, the batsman shoulders arms
teases the batsman with a full outswinger again, DK comes forward and pushes it to cover
and he hits the pads first ball and appeals, but this one was probably just over the stumps and would have missed the leg stump too
length delivery outside off, the batsman comes forward and pushes it to cover
short of length delivery on off, the batsman punches it to cover off the back foot
he gets a six off a mishit! He made some room and flashed hard at a short of length delivery. He was aiming to point-coverpoint region, but got a thick top edge that went over the third man fielder
length delivery on the stumps, he tucks it to deep backward square leg for a couple
here comes the yorkaa.. Rohit brings his bat down in time to dig it out
he bowls it full and wide outside off, the batsman lets it go through
bowls a wide length delivery that DK follows, he gets some bat on it, but ends up bunting it on the pitch
he adjusts well to the delivery as it bounced a touch extra outside off, the batsman places it in the gap at point for a couple
he bowls length now and slightly wide of the crease, the batsman leaves it alone
another length delivery outside off, one more time DK leaves it alone
he goes for a drive to a wide one, but plays a touch too early. Ends up pushing it back to the bowler as the bat turns in his hands
short of length delivery outside off, the batsman pushes it to point
another back of length delivery, but this time it's on the off and middle line, the batsman whips it past square leg
he comes forward to a length delivery and opens the face late to run it down to third man
now comes a bouncer to test the batsman, but Malinga pitches it too short. It sails over the batsman's head
another short ball, this one gets up chest high, Rohit stands tall and tucks it down to fine leg for a single
he is very lucky here! Malinga bowls a length delivery that swung into DK, who close the bat face a touch too early. The ball took a leading edge and lobbed up just behind the non-striker
another peach of a delivery as it leaves the batsman after pitching on a length, DK is not sure of the line and plays inside it..

Rohit is lucky to survive that, this is like a fast offbreak that has pitched comfortably outside off and jagged in enough after pitching to almost take the off pole out, Rohit was right in leaving on the original line, and lucky to live on
defends a back of a length ball
Rohit's started to take another battering now, he took several blows two days ago, another one moves in a mile and smacks him on the box
this stays a tad low outside off from a length now, and Rohit crouches as he guides it to point
short ball, not getting up too much again, Rohit pulls, off the front foot, but forward square leg stops it
eases this length ball to mid off and starts running, he has some ground to make but is safe in the end, throw misses anyway
opens the face trying to get the single  but point slides and denies him
he'll get the single now, waits and opens the face late this time, and point cannot stop it
gets across and runs a length ball wide of slip
allows it to come on from a length, and guides it late to third man
right forward to defend to short extra cover
another single to third man off a good length ball
super, drew him forward with a tossed up ball and spun it sharply past the edge, Sanga has the bails off but DK is fine
this is flighted as well but carries in with the angle, DK plays for the turn and gets a thick inside edge
gets the stride forward to block
smothered off the front foot
went back to a length ball that stayed low and slid in, he was able to work it square
slightly wide and full from Herath, and Rohit slices a drive past the man at point
ripper, pitches just outside off on a length, DK is forward, the ball bounces and leaves him to beat the edge
he walks out this time, Malinga hurls it in full, DK flicks it square and gets back for two
DK gets his first boundary off his 28th ball, off a thick edge between wide slip and the keeper as he comes half forward to a length ball
nothing edgy about this one, full on the pads goes Malinga and DK, standing outside the crease, is quick to whip him in front of square leg
on the pads yet again, and worked square for one more
pushes softly in front of point and trots out for the single, but fielder is already onto the ball
opens the face and runs it past point
presses forward to a tossed up ball
pushes half forward in front of point and sprints down, DK is not interested and Rohit makes it back just in time
walks out and pushes for one to mid on
goes deep in the crease to a length ball and tries to work it square, can't time it
right forward to smother a tossed up ball on the off side
Malinga starts the over with a short ball well down the leg side
stays in the crease and steers a climbing length ball to third man
back and across to run a length ball to third man
very full on off stump, he gets half forward and pats it back
steers a widish short of a length ball to deep point
nice touch, DK is on the walk, and eases a pitched up ball past the non-striker, no chance for mid on
a short ball arrives, DK bends the knee, drops the wrists and weaves inside the line
a push to cover and now DK wants the single, Rohit sends him back
tossed up generously, he is forward to defend
steps out but is too close to the pitch and ends up swatting to midwicket
is done in the flight as he comes down again and is hit on the pad as he wants to defend
leans forward and whips a flighted ball past the non-striker to long on

that flies, that really flies but Mahela Jayawardene is standing in the way at slip and it ends up as catch No 201, DK tried to punch this off the back foot, it hurries on from a length, and the thick edge races to Mahela, he does well to hang on somehow
and his first ball is a bouncer, Rohit sways inside the line
another short ball, head-high, Rohit hooks, and the top edge almost goes over the fine leg rope
good length, he pushes softly in front of midwicket
Raina moves across outside off and works a short of a length ball to midwicket
worked in front of mid on from off stump and it is a very safe run in the end
Raina moves forward, opens the face and splits the gap between slip and gully
leans forward and across to work it to midwicket
brings bat around front pad to nudge in front of square leg
opens the face as he comes forward and pushes, short extra cover dives but cannot prevent the single
works a full delivery to deep midwicket
angled in full, he knocks it down to long on
almost gets into trouble, comes forward and forcefully pushes in the air, it falls short of midwicket
forward to defend one angled in to off
moves across and turns it from off stump to midwicket
Raina leans forward and drives eagerly through the covers for a couple
bends over late and dabs a widish length ball to third man
short ball comes for Raina, does not get up too much, he pulls it down behind square leg
Raina sees some width and goes after it, reaching out to drive to the left of the sweeper, he does not have much ground to make, but this is hit hard
languidly comes out of the crease, but cannot do much more than knock it back to the bowler
defended off the front foot
leaves the crease once more, not to the pitch again, and pushes to the off side
super, angled in to off, and spins away past the outside edge as Rohit goes back
Rohit tries the slog-sweep but only manages an underedge to short fine leg
this is tossed up, Rohit is drawn to reach out at it, the ball carries in with the angle, and he gets a thick inside edge
tries to whip it fine but cannot connect, it rolls to the keeper off the pad, Sri Lanka appeal for lbw, that pitched half a foot outside leg
there comes the bouncer, Raina does well, controlling a pull down to fine leg, brings the bat down on it
out of nowhere, Rohit goes over extra cover, takes it from a good length on off and drills it in the air
guides a very full one outside off past a diving gully to third man
a full toss just outside off now from Malinga, Raina squeezes it to the sweeper
excellent placement, superb control, Rohit gets a short ball that is not rising too much, he plays a whip-pull along the ground that races between deep square and fine leg
comes down the track but can only drive back to the bowler
stays in the crease and dabs to short third man

he didn't pick the one that comes in, escaped with a thick inside edge to short fine leg, and that is a fighting 50 for Rohit, that is what he has done all series, he has fought, it has not been pretty, but the combination of Rohit and pretty had not been producing much
moves across to work to square leg, and Rohit has to go back
squeezes a full ball down to long on
lunges forward to push it back to the bowler
starts with a good length ball down the leg side from over the stumps
gets on his toes to a back of a length ball and tucks it to deep square
shuffles across and works a length ball in front of square leg
turned to vacant midwicket, Raina charges down for another single, going at more than run a ball and bringing some momentum
short of a length, guided to third man
Raina likes this, a pitched up ball around off stump, he takes a step out and goes straight, high and clean over the bowler, lovely high followthrough
nudged off the pad, short fine leg's dive takes pace off it
and he starts with a length ball that does too much with the angle and swings in a tad as well, too much work for Sanga down the leg side
length ball around middle and off now, Rohit goes across and defends
too wide, Rohit flashes a cut in the air over point, always in control of the shot
comes forward and opens the face to take the single to third man
guides it from close to off stump, down to third man
takes a step out and lets a length ball go outside off
works an incoming length ball to midwicket for a single

he is gone! it has hit the middle stump just a couple of inches from the base. Stayed very low after pitching on length, Rohit was rightly crouching down because the ball was indeed very very low, unlike some of his Mumbai predecessors. Is this the opening that Sri Lanka need?
he goes on the back foot and plays a whippy punch, but straight to cover
comes forward this time and pushes the tossed up delivery to the off side
he goes on the back foot and plays a paddle shot fine on the leg side while standing upright..
he comes forward this time and defends a full delivery to the off
he comes forward and pushes the full delivery towards point
he comes forward and whips a full delivery outside off with a wristy flick to deep midwicket
fuller delivery outside off, keeps going away with the angle, the batsman leaves it alone
another length delivery just outside off, Raina comes forward tentatively in defense
he takes a forward stride and drives the length delivery to deep cover for a single
he bowls a length delivery outside off, the batsman lets it go. A slip fielder has been in place in this over
he makes a forward movement but leaves the ball alone as it's wide outside off
he bowls a quicker one on the stumps, Raina goes back and tucks it behind square on the leg side
he comes forward and defends the tossed up delivery to off
another fuller delivery on off, Dhoni defends again
he shortens the length a touch and beats Dhoni with the turn as the batsman tries to play it square on off
quicker delivery on the pads, the batsman defends to the leg side
fuller and quicker on off, the batsman defends it to cover

and now Raina follows! Sri Lanka are indeed pulling the rug under India's batsmen's feet! Raina went for a hoick to the leg side, but the length delivery took a decent edge and flew at a comfortable height to the left  of the keeper
gets a short of length delivery on the body, it makes Jadeja jump as he defends that
length delivery on off, the batsman waits in the crease and defends it to point
some positive defence now from Jadeja as he comes forward to a length delivery and gets solidly behind it

hesitation all over! Jadeja almost took out his captain there. He pushed a length ball to mid on and called for a non-existent single, Dhoni didn't want to and rightly so, but Jadeja kept coming through. Dhoni responded late and was running towards the striker's end and came in between the throw and the stumps. Sri Lanka are contemplating an appeal for obstructing the field, but they decide against it. Dhoni was running straight in his path. Mahela and Sanga were convinced Dhoni changed his direction.
he goes back and defends the length ball down the pitch
tossed up delivery on the middle stump, Jadeja goes for a big sweep, but gets a bottom edge fine on the leg side. Senanayake makes a good sliding save at the boundary
punched to midwicket off the backfoot
flatter delivery on the pads, Jadeja wanted to help it on its way, but gets hit on the pads
tossed up delivery on the middle and leg line, the batsman misses the ball in his forward lunge. Loud appeal for lbw, but that was going down leg
he pushes the ball to the off side and looks for a single, but Dhoni doesn't want to run
tossed up and turning in to the batsman, Jadeja comes forward and misses the ball. It hits his body
he bowls it full on off stump, Dhoni tries to whip it to the leg side, but gets an inside edge on to his pads
he waits on the back foot for this length delivery on off stump, dabs it towards midwicket and calls for a single
he bowls a full delivery outside off and Jadeja goes for a big heave, misses it completely
he bowls a slower delivery on the leg stump line, the batsman punches it to deep midwicket for a single
length delivery on off stump, the batsman pushes it to wide mid-off for a single
short of length delivery on the middle stump, the batsman gets up on his toes and punches it to deep midwicket. Dhoni is happy with a single

and another one for Herath! Jadeja has been taken out! The weight of the remaining 50 runs is getting heavier on the Indians. It was a flatter delivery and Jadeja went on the back foot, but it pitched on off and spun back sharply into the batsman to hit him on the back leg. Easy decision for the umpire

two in two! Herath does it again, he bowls a quicker arm ball and the batsman gets stuck in the crease as he tries to defend. He misses the line of the ball and gets hit in front of the leg stump. The umpire raises the finger of doom...
oye! this one was on off stump, but it stayed low, Bhuvi gets a toe-end to that
tossed up delivery on off, Bhuvi pushes it to mid-on
quicker delivery on off, the batsman defends it off the front foot
tossed up delivery on off again, the batsman defends it down the pitch
he bowls fuller delivery outside off, Dhoni wanted to slap it over long on, but is beaten by that one
he almost punches it back to the bowler! It fell just short of the bowler diving forward in his follow through
length delivery wide outside off, Dhoni now wants to whack it over cover, but gets a thick outside edge that flies over the first-slip fielder...
he bowls a full delivery on off, the batsman drives it firmly but finds the fielder at extra cover
another full delivery on off, this time he drives it powerfully down the ground to long off
he bowls a fullish delivery on off stump which Bhuvi defends with a solid forward push
he bowls a full toss on off stump and all Dhoni has to do is to place it in the gap at deep midwicket. Pressure released
length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it hard, but straight to cover
beats Dhoni with a peach of a delivery. It pitches on off stump, on a length, then leaves the batsman
similar delivery as the last one and Malinga manages to draw an outside edge, but there is no one at slip and it runs down fine on the off side very quickly
now a slip fielder comes in, but Dhoni manages to get the full face behind the ball as he pushes it to point. Another similar delivery as the previous two
length delivery just outside off, the batsman pushes it to point again
he bowls a full delivery on off, Bhuvi comes forward and drives it to mid on
length delivery on off stump now, the batsman defends it down the pitch
he waits on the back foot for this length delivery, but it stays a touch low. He is lucky to get some bat on this one
back of length this time, more resolute defence by Bhuvneshwar
he bowls a length delivery in the channel outside off, gets good bounce too. Bhuvi lets it go through
he goes on the back foot and punches the short of length delivery to point
he bowls a quick short delivery on the body, Dhoni drops it down towards backward square leg and picks up a single
he bowls a short of length delivery on off, the batsman calmly defends it to off
he bowls that knee high slower delivery and Bhuvi didn't pick that up at all. Luckily for him, it was down the leg side
short of length delivery on off, the batsman defends this one easily to the off
sees that the line is slightly outside off and leaves it alone calmly
He's gone! he's gone! It's a yorker, yes, but it's slower too! Bhuvi's bat came down a touch too early and he gets hit on the toe, right in front...
exactly the same delivery, but Vinay knew it was coming, he blocks it with ease
length delivery outside off, the batsman punches it firmly to extra cover
how did he find that gap! It looked like he was playing a back foot defensive shot on the off, but he opened the face at the last moment to push it in the gap between point and short third man
now he hops on his toes and whips a delivery from outside off to deep backward square leg, struggles to get back for the second..
short of length delivery outside off, this time Dhoni guides it to third man for a single
short of length delivery on off, the batsman opens the face to run it down to third man
length delivery on off, Dhoni pushes it to point, Vinay charges halfway down for a run, Dhoni says now and  Vinay has to turn back and dive to get back into the crease
it's not a yorker, it's a length ball that angles away from the batsman, beats the bat. Two slips are waiting for the edge
length delivery, but this one slides down the leg side. Sanga doesn't make a clean stop and it allows a single. The umpire signals a leg bye
length delivery on off stump, Dhoni defends
length delivery outside off, Dhoni steers it to third man, but rightly turns down the single.
length delivery outside off, calmly he pushes it to cover
length delivery wide outside off, this time Dhoni lets it go through
he bowls a good length delivery outside off, Vinay stays calm, leave it alone
another teaser wide outside off, Vinay watches it carefully, then lets it go
he bowls a fuller delivery on off, Vinay slices it through backward point and Dhoni is happy to come back for a second
back of length delivery outside off, Vinay comes forward, then leaves it alone
length delivery on off stump, Vinay defends it off the back foot
the batsman pushes it to the gap at cover, but Dhoni doesn't take the single
length delivery on the middle and leg line, Dhoni walks across and wanted to flick it fine, but gets hit on the pad. It was sliding down leg, but the batsmen take a single
he bowls a fuller length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it back to the bowler
fuller delivery wide outside off, Vinay watches it go through to the keeper
he tries to whack that length delivery to the midwicket boundary, but gets a leading edge over point, they take a couple
he is aiming at the stumps, bowls a length delivery on off, Vinay defends it from the crease
length delivery wide outside off, Vinay lets it go through and gives the strike to his captain. Excellent.
he goes on the back foot and works the length delivery from outside off to square leg, settles for a single

caught at short third man! What a terrible shot to play at this stage! It was a shortish delivery outside off and Vinay chooses to send it to the stands, gets a thick edge and the ball balloons for the fielder at short third man to take an easy catch. When he got five balls in this over, was he planning to finish the match here itself? Absurd
length delivery outside off, Dhoni drive it on the up with a lot of power, beautifully fielded by the mid-off fielder. Had it passed him, that was a boundary
now a short of length delivery is hit straight to point off the back foot
length delivery wide outside off, the batsman pushes it to cover and takes off for a single
he gets a short of length ball on the body, defends it easily down the pitch
length delivery outside off, Dhoni wanted to punch it through cover, but gets an inside edge back down the pitch
another length delivery on off, Dhoni defends it to off
short of length with a little bit of width, Dhoni cracks powerfully to deep cover, but turns down the single
length delivery on the off stump line, Dhoni works it towards deep midwicket off the back foot and calls for a couple
another length ball outside off, this time he guides it to third man, thinks about a single, then goes back to his crease

he pushes it straight to point, Ishant had run halfway down for the single which wasn't there. Dhoni had loudly said NO. Ishant turned back and had to dive to get in. Malinga was not near the stumps and the ball was not too far away ..
What is Ishant upto! This time he pushes it straight to cover, runs halfway down, then has to dive again to get back in...
length delivery on off, the batsman pushes it back down the pitch
he tries to guide the short of length delivery down to third man, gets beaten
he decides to go over the infield, but slices it over point and comes back for a tight couple
angled delivery on the stumps, Ishant blocks it out towards square leg
length delivery outside off, Ishant lets it go through to the relief of Dhoni
fuller delivery wide outside off, Dhoni swings his bat but he is nowhere near the ball..

that has gone out of the ground! It was wide and full and in Dhoni's arc! He has sent this straight over the bowler's head and it hits the top of the roof... What a hit! Another couple and it's game over.. A wicket, and it's game over too
and now he finds a boundary over point! Dhoni is awake, he was not sleeping, he was waiting for his moment. Length delivery, he opens the face of the bat as he goes after it, slices it over point...
five needed! Dhoni does it again! Is there anything he can't do! He slaps the length delivery over extra cover for another six! India take the title with one wicket
